mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wa_logistics_info SET order_id = #{orderId}, from_address = #{fromAddress}, to_address = #{toAddress}, num = #{number}, pre_payment = #{prePayment}, state = #{state}, order_date = #{orderDate}, deliver_date = #{deliverDate}, prod_id = #{prodId}, prod_name = #{prodName}, seller_user_name = #{sellerUserName}, seller_user_id = #{sellerUserId}, customer_user_name = #{customerUserName}, customer_user_id = #{customerUserId}
